item.title: [508] adding custom NPCS
item.dc:creator: @bloodisle bloodisle
item.description:
@bloodisle wrote:

Purpose: To hardcode/edit Npc’s on a normal 508 LD client.

Difficulty: 4/10? not that hard

Tested On: Bloobooms client http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=120252

Although i said i wasnt going to release any more of these, this is my last one to complete my “series” of hardcoding tutorials



First open up Class68_Sub13_Sub11.java and search for:

public static Class80 method753

you will see somthing like this

public static Class80 method753(int i, int i_52_) {
	anInt3601++;
	Class80 class80
	    = (Class80) Class93.aClass98_1662.method1570(14366, (long) i);
	if (class80 != null)
	    return class80;
	byte[] is
	    = Class1_Sub1.aClass21_2427.method338(Class90.method1515(i, 522),
						  0,
						  Class1_Sub6.method148(i,
									-95));
	class80 = new Class80();
	class80.anInt1458 = i;
	if (is != null)
	    class80.method1443(new Stream(is), (byte) -53);
	int i_53_ = 100 / ((-43 - i_52_) / 50);
	class80.method1452(24381);
	Class93.aClass98_1662.method1568(class80, 104, (long) i);
	return class80;
    }

This is the forID method for Npcs

under

Class93.aClass98_1662.method1568(class80, 104, (long) i);

add

if(i == 2745)
	{
                        class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, "Jad Fails");//Name
		class80.anInt1444 = 9203;//combat level
		class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot?
		class80.anInt1439 = 0;//Set Headicon ID
		class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking?
                        //class80.anInt1461 = 200;//resize width
		//class80.anInt1416 = 200;//resize height
		//class80.anInt1409 = 1232;//stand animation
		//class80.anIntArray1454 = new int[1];//model count
		//class80.anIntArray1454[0] = 2937;//model 1
	}

It works pretty much the same as 317, ill keep updating this post when i find more variables.

list of variables - almost every variable you would need

anInt1415 - walking right animation
anInt1410 - walking backwards animation
anInt1444 - Npcs combat level
aRSString_1466 - Npcs name
aRSStringArray1432 - actions
anInt1440 - normal walk animation
anInt1451 - length of npc
aShortArray1412 - Changed model colour
anIntArray1435 - Dialogue Models
anInt1439 - Set npcs HeadIcon
aShortArray1443 - Original Model Colors
anInt1409 - Stand animation
anInt1456 - getDegreesToTurn
anInt1447 - walk left animation
aBoolean1433 - false disables rightclicking
anInt1428 - Higher/decrease npcs model brightness
anInt1416 - resize npcs Height!!
aBoolean1438 - draw yellow dot on minimap//used for npcs such as fishing spots
anInt1461 - Adjust npcs width!!
anInt1462 - edit model contrast!

Read full topic
